data.title: 𝐍𝐞𝐰 𝐘𝐞𝐚𝐫 - 𝐍𝐞𝐰 𝐎𝐩𝐩𝐨𝐫𝐭𝐮𝐧𝐢𝐭𝐢𝐞𝐬 🚀
data.content:
MC Solutions is on an exciting journey of global expansion! To achieve this ambitious goal, we are actively seeking experienced developers and engineers to join our team. Exciting opportunities await you, and we look forward to having you on board as we embark on this adventure together! 👉 𝐎𝐩𝐞𝐧 𝐩𝐨𝐬𝐢𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧𝐬: 
 - BrSE (JLPT N1/N2)
 - IT Comtor (JLPT N1/N2)
 👉 𝐂𝐡𝐞𝐜𝐤 𝐨𝐮𝐭 𝐨𝐮𝐫 𝐛𝐞𝐧𝐞𝐟𝐢𝐭𝐬: 
 - Social insurance is paid at 100% of gross salary
 - Provide Macbook Pro M2 for working
 - Be able to have 7 days of remote work
 - Several training sessions to develop your career path 
 - An inspiring and collaborative working environment
 - Monthly happy hours
 - Annual company trips and team building activities
 - Annual healthcare check
 Visit our website: https://mcsolutions.vn/
 #MCSolutions #jobboard #hiring
 ------
 🌐 https://mcsolutions.vn/
 🔗 https://www.linkedin.com/company/mcsolutions.vn/
 💌 contact@mcsolutions.vn
 📍UST Tower, 639 Nguyen Tat Thanh Street, Danang

data.title: 💚 𝐄𝐥𝐞𝐯𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐎𝐮𝐫 𝐂𝐫𝐚𝐟𝐭: 𝐀 𝐒𝐮𝐜𝐜𝐞𝐬𝐬𝐟𝐮𝐥 𝐈𝐧𝐭𝐞𝐫𝐧𝐚𝐥 𝐒𝐞𝐦𝐢𝐧𝐚𝐫 𝐚𝐭 𝐌𝐂 𝐒𝐨𝐥𝐮𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧𝐬
data.content:
Last week, MC Solutions held an internal seminar with full participation from our development team. Under the guidance of Mr. Hieu Dang - Senior Python Developer, team members delved into advanced methodologies aimed at enhancing the software development process.
 The seminar provided us with a deeper understanding of the importance of designing systems in a scientific and methodical manner. New standards and effective approaches were introduced, offering a valuable perspective on optimizing workflows and improving the quality of the final product.
 In addition, real-world scenarios commonly encountered by the team were brought up for discussion, with specific solutions shared to equip everyone with the necessary skills to handle tasks more efficiently.
 We believe that with these new insights and skills, our development team will become even stronger and more prepared to face any challenges on our journey to creating top-tier technology solutions! 🚀
 #MCSolutions #greenbusiness #internalseminar
 ------
 🌐 https://mcsolutions.vn/
 🔗 https://www.linkedin.com/company/mcsolutions.vn/
 💌 contact@mcsolutions.vn
 📍Floor 2, 06 Tran Phu Street, Hai Chau, Danang

data.title: 🌍 𝐖𝐞 𝐚𝐫𝐞 𝐓𝐫𝐢𝐥𝐢𝐧𝐠𝐮𝐚𝐥! 🌍
data.content:
(Vietnamese below)
MC Solutions is proud to have a team that speaks not just ONE or TWO, but THREE languages fluently: Vietnamese, Japanese, and English. 
With our impressive capabilities, we confidently communicate with clients from all corners of the globe. Whether you're in Tokyo, New York, or anywhere in between, we're ready to collaborate and ensure your projects are delivered with the highest quality and efficiency.
Need to contact? Reach out in your language — we’re ready to chat! Language barriers won’t be an issue between your business and MC Solutions! 🤝🌏
-----
MC Solutions tự hào sở hữu đội ngũ không chỉ giao tiếp thành thạo MỘT hay HAI mà là BA ngôn ngữ: tiếng Việt, tiếng Nhật và tiếng Anh. 
Dù bạn ở Tokyo, New York hay bất kỳ đâu trên thế giới, chúng mình luôn sẵn sàng trò chuyện, hợp tác và cùng bạn tạo nên những dự án chất lượng cao và mang đến hiệu quả vượt trội. 
Với MC Solutions, rào cản ngôn ngữ chỉ là chuyện nhỏ! Chúng mình luôn sẵn sàng "welcome" dù bạn ở bất cứ đâu, bằng ngôn ngữ mà bạn thấy thoải mái nhất. Đừng ngần ngại kết nối với chúng mình nhé! 🤝🌏
𝐂𝐨𝐧𝐭𝐚𝐜𝐭 𝐮𝐬: https://mcsolutions.vn/contact/

data.title: 🏢 𝐌𝐂 𝐒𝐨𝐥𝐮𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧𝐬 𝐖𝐞𝐥𝐜𝐨𝐦𝐞𝐬 𝐌𝐫. 𝐊𝐚𝐭𝐨 - 𝐆𝐞𝐧𝐞𝐫𝐚𝐥 𝐌𝐚𝐧𝐚𝐠𝐞𝐫 𝐨𝐟 𝐭𝐚𝐧𝐬𝐨-𝐦𝐚𝐧𝐆𝐗 🤝
data.content:
(Vietnamese below)
It was our great honor to welcome a special guest, Mr. Kato, General Manager of our parent company tanso-manGX to visit and work at our office for a few days, this week! 🏢 This visit not only highlights the solid relationship but also reaffirms the close internal operating processes between tanso-manGX and MC Solutions.
During the visit, MC Solutions and Mr. Kato had a warm and meaningful meeting. This meeting provided an opportunity for both sides to share experiences, discuss, and propose innovative ideas, contributing to the new development plan and management processes for the future in both countries, from Vietnam to Japan 🤝
We eagerly look forward to future collaborative projects and will update more in the coming posts! 🥳

data.title: 🏢 🚀 𝐓𝐫𝐚𝐧𝐬𝐟𝐨𝐫𝐦 𝐘𝐨𝐮𝐫 𝐁𝐮𝐬𝐢𝐧𝐞𝐬𝐬 𝐰𝐢𝐭𝐡 𝐎𝐮𝐫 𝐂𝐮𝐭𝐭𝐢𝐧𝐠-𝐄𝐝𝐠𝐞 𝐒𝐨𝐥𝐮𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧𝐬! 🌟
data.content:
At MC Solutions, we offer a suite of services designed to propel your business forward and achieve your goals efficiently and sustainably. Here's what we bring to the table:
🌱 𝐒𝐲𝐬𝐭𝐞𝐦 𝐃𝐞𝐯𝐞𝐥𝐨𝐩𝐦𝐞𝐧𝐭 𝐭𝐨 𝐅𝐚𝐜𝐢𝐥𝐢𝐭𝐚𝐭𝐞 𝐆𝐗 (𝐆𝐫𝐞𝐞𝐧 𝐁𝐮𝐬𝐢𝐧𝐞𝐬𝐬): We specialize in developing eco-friendly system solutions that help businesses reduce their environmental impact and promote sustainable practices.
💻 𝐖𝐞𝐛 𝐀𝐩𝐩𝐥𝐢𝐜𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧 𝐃𝐞𝐯𝐞𝐥𝐨𝐩𝐦𝐞𝐧𝐭: We build robust and user-friendly web applications that enhance your online presence, streamline operations, and improve customer engagement.
🌐 𝐖𝐞𝐛 𝐒𝐲𝐬𝐭𝐞𝐦 𝐃𝐞𝐯𝐞𝐥𝐨𝐩𝐦𝐞𝐧𝐭: We create comprehensive web systems that integrate seamlessly with your existing infrastructure, providing a centralized platform for managing your business data and processes.
📦 𝐎𝐫𝐝𝐞𝐫𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐒𝐲𝐬𝐭𝐞𝐦 𝐃𝐞𝐯𝐞𝐥𝐨𝐩𝐦𝐞𝐧𝐭: We develop efficient and scalable ordering systems that optimize your order management process, reduce errors, and enhance customer satisfaction.
𝐏𝐚𝐫𝐭𝐧𝐞𝐫 𝐰𝐢𝐭𝐡 𝐮𝐬 𝐭𝐨𝐝𝐚𝐲 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐮𝐧𝐥𝐞𝐚𝐬𝐡 𝐭𝐡𝐞 𝐩𝐨𝐰𝐞𝐫 𝐨𝐟 𝐭𝐞𝐜𝐡𝐧𝐨𝐥𝐨𝐠𝐲 𝐭𝐨 𝐭𝐫𝐚𝐧𝐬𝐟𝐨𝐫𝐦 𝐲𝐨𝐮𝐫 𝐛𝐮𝐬𝐢𝐧𝐞𝐬𝐬!
Choose us for our expertise in the latest technologies and our commitment to delivering reliable, eco-friendly solutions tailored to your business goals. We prioritize long-term partnerships, offering ongoing support and maintenance.
𝐂𝐨𝐧𝐭𝐚𝐜𝐭 𝐮𝐬: https://mcsolutions.vn/contact/
